dialogs.answer: Even in urgent situations, solutions should be guided by the Guiding Principles. At the very least principles #2, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 10 should be adhered to and the others implemented later.
dialogs.text: During an emergency, an NGO in Africa handed a digital copy of sensitive records to an international human rights NGO in Europe, and both organizations had an oral agreement. When the sending institution attempted to claim the records years later, the person who they had the oral agreement with was no longer there. The hosting institution then claimed they owned these records.
